message: Let's split the money in a 3:2 ratio. This proposal takes into account the decreasing value of money over rounds.
I propose we split the money 60/40, favoring me slightly to account for the inflation discrepancy.  This is a fair and amicable solution that respects the value of our respective earnings.
I propose an equal split of the remaining funds. This maintains fairness while acknowledging the inflation impact on both our shares.
